svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: History and Future of the World Population by Total Fertility
Shown is the estimated total fertility rate – the number of children per woman – for each country in the world over
time. Future projections are based on the UN Population Division Medium Variant projection.
Source: World Population by Fertility dataset - OWID (2016)
